intro_text: Your patrol hears some odd noises coming from an abandoned Twoleg nest
success_text: It's just an old loner singing to themselves
fail_text: Your patrol walks into an ambush by a group of rogues and everyone is slaughtered
decline_text: Your patrol decides not to investigate

intro_text: There are dark clouds in the horizon and p_l wonders if they should continue
success_text: The cats become wet from the rain but otherwise the patrol is successful
fail_text: There is a downpour and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away'
decline_text: Your patrol decides to head back early

intro_text: Your patrol encounters a clearing where a lot of Twolegs linger
fail_text: The Twolegs notice the cats and trap them in their monsters. The cats on your patrol are never seen again
decline_text: Your patrol decides to hunt elsewhere
